justification: The Offering specifies 'scalable storage solutions with tiered options (Hot, Cool, and Archive) to efficiently manage data based on access frequency and retention needs,' which directly aligns with storing, organizing, and retrieving data according to frequency and retention. However, it does not explicitly detail retrieval mechanisms or cost/effort reduction beyond offering such tiers, which lowers certainty about full compliance.
ability: The ability to store, organize and retrieve data  based on how frequently it will be accessed and how long it will be retained.
